page.title: 10MINIMARKET, THATCHAM.
page.content: Mr and Mrs Kara run a general store in Station Road, Thatcham to provide a service for the local people when central Thatcham shops are closed. The opening hours are 8_8 pm Monday to Saturday ,9_2 pm on Sunday. The shop is busy when the Kennet pupils go to school and in the afternoon when they come home. Mr Kara sells stamps and has a postbox in the shop. Some of the customers come nearly every day, as they like the shop being open long hours on Sundays when the bigger shops are closed. People come from all around to go to the shop. We interviewed several people from Longbridge Road. One man came from Andover. Mr Kara doesn't think he will lose them when the new shops nearby are built since, if the food is always fresh he will get his customers.
